text: ab yadi tumhen aashchary hee karana hai to aashchary kee baat to unaka yah kahana hai ki ,"kya jab ham mittee ho jaenge to kya ham nae sire se paida bhee honge?" vahee hain jinhonne apane rab ke saath inakaar kee neeti apanaee aur vahee hai, jinakee gardanon me tauq pade hue hai aur vahee aag (mein padane) vaale hai jisamen unhen sadaiv rahana hai
